frontmatter.title: New Website of IIIT Dharwad | Mentorship

node.html: Overlooking and mentoring the new website of IIIT Dharwad!
WON the Postman Go w/ the Flow hackathon for building a flow that generates a pie chart of the characteristics of your top tracks from Spotify and tweets it on your behalf.
Major Contribution in optimizing, improving security and building a structured OAuth flow of Scholar Chat - A platform for researchers to connect and chat with their orcid.
Leading a learning project in a team of more than 10 people. The project is a clone of the Booking.com website. The project is being developed using ReactJS and Netlify.
A Twitter bookmarking tool powered with a Telegram Bot!
The powerful telegram bot which lets you save your tweets and access them anywhere.
A simple python script that geneartes accounts and follows the specified user on twitter.
